definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 sheng4 yu2 ding4 li3
dai4 shu4 ji1 ben3 ding4 li3

definition: fundamental theorem of algebra (every polynomial has a complex root)
pinyin: dai4 shu4 xue2 ji1 ben3 ding4 li3
wei1 ji1 fen1 ji1 ben3 ding4 li3

sentences.english: It is proved that the Fermat Grand Theorem is tenable in the first case.
sentences.chinese: 證明了費爾馬大定理第一情形成立。

sentences.english: Hence approximated sampling theorem in the wavelet packets space is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 由此建立了這種小波包子空間上的近似採樣定理。

sentences.english: This paper gives a simple proof of the first mid -value theorem of Integral.
sentences.chinese: 本文就積分第一中值定理給出了一個簡單的證明。

sentences.english: Ricardian Equivalence Rule is an important factor which is used to evaluate fiscal deficit effect.
sentences.chinese: 李嘉圖等價定理是評價財政赤字效果的重要因素之一。

sentences.english: Another major class of theorems deals with less stringent conditions.
sentences.chinese: 另外一大類定理處理不太嚴勵的條件。

sentences.english: As I mentioned before, proofs use axioms and theorems to make their case.
sentences.chinese: 如前所述，證明以公理和定理做爲其論據。

sentences.english: The famous max-flow min-cut theorem determines the maximum throughput of a network.
sentences.chinese: 最大流最小割定理決定了網絡的最大吞吐量。

sentences.english: Methods Using the theorem of center manifold and bifurcation theory of planar system.
sentences.chinese: 方法利用中心流形定理並結合平面系統的分支理論。

sentences.english: Polynomials, including relationships involving the roots of quadratic and cubic equations, the remainder theorem.
sentences.chinese: 多項式，包括二次求根，三次方程式，餘部定理。

sentences.english: Sinusoidal steady-state maximum average power transfer theorem is important content in circuit teaching.
sentences.chinese: 正弦穩態最大功率傳輸定理是電路教學中的重要內容。

sentences.english: A direct proof of the theorem is given in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文給出了該定理的一個直接證明。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the proof and application of Cauchy mean-value theorem from many angles.
sentences.chinese: 本文多角度介紹了柯西中值定理的證明方法和應用。

sentences.english: And the applicability of Virial theorem is not clear either.
sentences.chinese: 而且維裏定理對此類系統的適用性也沒有明確結論。

sentences.english: Solvability of a second order multi-point boundary value problem with generalized Sturm-Liouville boundary condition;
sentences.chinese: 得到了一類離散多點邊值問題的正解的存在性定理。

sentences.english: Random fixed point theorems are of fundamental importance in probabilistic functional analysis.
sentences.chinese: 隨機不動點定理在隨機泛函分析中起重要作用。

sentences.english: A coincidence theorem on set-valued mapping is directly derived according to the section theorem.
sentences.chinese: 並且用截口定理直接證明了多值映射的一個重合定理。

definition: scientific law (e.g. law of conservation of energy)/(in human affairs) a generalization based on observation (e.g. "power corrupts")
